item.title: Getting involved
item.description:
Rust for Linux

The best starting place is probably the web page of the project, rust-for-linux.com. This page is meant as a hub of links, documentations and resources to this topic. One source that does not seem to work well is the github Good first issues page, which currently is not up to date, and all good first issues are already done or in progress by somebody. On the other hand, the Rust-for-Linux github repo is still in use and commits are pushed to it on a regular basis.
